code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances, moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and Mental Health for 5 days. patient is a white male piano tuner aged 47 years. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he denies smoking o:Height 174 cm, Weight 105.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

td.content: s:patient complains of moderate shortness of breath occurring with exertion, mild shortness of breath and mild difficulty breathing when laying down. NKDA. he is a 48 year old white male piano tuner. Denies ever using tobacco Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 173 cm, Weight 103.8 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Chest = bibasilar crackles B/L, Heart = normal S1, S2, laterally displaced apical impulse, Extremities = no cyanosis, no edema or clubbing, Heart = distant heart sounds and no murmur, Abdomen = tender, mild hepatomegaly a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed enalapril - 2.5 mg 2 x day, and ordered BNP.
